text: Mba mbik maaŋ mbuim, mba Zisasan kamgim, ana zav ana phenan zɨgi Fherasi guma, ana mba mbik mbui tɨva gangiap kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, “Ai, kha guma, ana guigira Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma guar kake, ana khar anan suigi mbik, ana ana kaŋge. Ana vhɨra ana mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi, ana vhɨra nta kaŋge. Kha mbik, ana guigira tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui mbik ma.”
